item.title: Creating this Blog: Hugo, making the Hyde theme multilingual, and adding Latex support.
item.description: What got me started was Hui Gong’s excellent blog entry on building a personal blog using GitHub Pages and Hugo. I knew about Github Pages,but not about Hugo. I had Hugo running and my own skeleton version of this blog using the very nice and minimal Hyde theme by following the blog.
